driverInputPrompts.name: Select Database Version:
driverInputPrompts.type: enum; Format (Informix Dynamic Server Enterprise 11->ifx11|Informix Dynamic Server Enterprise 12->ifx12)

driverInputPrompts.name: Third-party JDBC implementation:
driverInputPrompts.type: enum; Format (Informix JDBC Driver (filename- ifxjdbc.jar)->com.informix.jdbc.IfxDriver|Some Other JDBC Implementation->_custom)

driverInputPrompts.name: Data flow:
driverInputPrompts.type: enum; Format (bi-directional->both|Identity Manager to database (subscribe)->subscribe|database to Identity Manager (publish)->publish)
